JOTUN Safeguard universal es 15L(A)+03L(B)

JOTUN

2Kpolyamideepoxytie coat
851,277 DTIn stock
Single configuration

This is a two component polyamide cured vinyl epoxy based coating. Specially designed as a tie coat between epoxy primers and antifouling systems. Can be used as tie coat / holding primer for a wide range of topcoats. To be used as tie coat in atmospheric and immersed environments. Suitable on approved primers on alumi…
